name: Spooky The Coward - Post Jam Version
name_original: Spooky The Coward - Post Jam Version
description:
**********READ FIRST **************

If you want to vote on the jam entry please use the version in this link

https://itch.io/jam/game-zanga-6/rate/83891

This is a post-jam version that fixes some of the main bugs in the previous version..

***********************************************

Story:

Although Spooky is a ghost, he is terrified of darkness and always seeks the light. Help spooky get through illusionary blocks; around spikes; and to the safety of the light.

Controls:

Move using A,D

Jump using Space

Right Click to make illusionary blocks real

Left Click to shoot your grappling beam

Team:

Ahmad Abuzuraiq @ahmedabuzreq

Mohammed Ghawanni @M7md_Ghawanni

Mohammed AlMuhanna @Moh_Muhanna

Special thanks:
